name: World Cup Collector
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a world champion? You can do it here

This game is based on Argentina. You will be able to learn things about Argentine culture while you play a simple buy addictive game. 

Collect every single world cup before the time finishes and dodge obstacles. You may even face a famous footballer!

With that world cups you can buy items in the shop such as skins, upgrades and boosts

I encourage you to post in a comment your best level and which items of the shop you have! 

What is better than competing with the others?
